map.name: kitchen
map.info: This is a well furnished kitchen.

map.name: hallway
map.info:
The hallway is completely dark, except for a soft light 
coming around the edges of doors to the north and east.

map.name: living room
map.info:
A large room well lit room, with wide windows opening to a scenic
horizon.

items.name: key
items.info: This is a small brass key.

items.name: cupboard
items.info: This is an ordinary kitchen cupboard, with a drawer and a door.

items.name: table
items.info:
This is a wide kitchen table, fixed against the western wall, with a
kitchen sink installed.

items.name: refrigerator
items.info: This is a large and modern looking refrigerator.

items.name: sink
items.info: The sink has faucets for cold and hot water.

items.name: horizon
items.info: Outside the window flat fields forming a patchwork of hues of green are bounded in the distance by forested hills.
